resources.string: Featuring questions made by James Mason, Wong Village, Jordangaming101, cgiben, Epiclafiteau, SpongeEngine423, and the admins about The TTTE Community Channel.
Application developed by Michael Abercrombie, Shawn Idahosa, and Ivan Quach

Who was the former admin of the ttte community? by Wong Village
What was the first mini-remake uploaded to Youtube? by jordangaming101
Which two episodes were chosen for the second community project? by cgiben
Questions, Considerations, Comments, Business Inquiries, or Ideas to add to the app.
What was the first remake submitted to the channel? by Epiclafiteau
Basics to Know for a Community Remake
How to Remake a clip V2 Video Click Here!
2. Please try to stick to the sample line given.
3. Do not mix audio from an actual episode and your audio together and pass it in as an audition.
4. Send all auditions as an UNLISTED video (no private or public videos will be accepted).
5. Send the video through the YouTube\'s messaging system (Look at the video on how to above).
6. Don\'t email us your audition (We may not see)
7. You can only audition for one character!
9. Follow the video\'s format for sending in an audition.
How to Audition to Voice a Character V2 Video Click Here!
How to Vote for Voice Actors V2 Video Click Here
Yes you can vote for yourself.
Do not promote your video. (Automatic Disqualification)
Do not share the link (of your video) to others (Automatic Disqualification)
You can share the link of the auditionâ€™s playlist.
We do not count dislikes for votes period.
Using multiple accounts to like your video is an automatic disqualification.

1. Clips may be remade in any format, using items such as model locomotives (eg. Trackmaster, Bachmann, Hornby etc.) and tools such as Trainz and Paint. Note that clips must NOT contain any actual Thomas and Friends footage, and must be made specially for this project.
2. All remade clips should keep to the original video as best as possible, including sets, locomotives present, camera angles and timing.
3. All remade clips should be the same length as the original clips and should have an extra two seconds of footage on each end of the clip, for cutting purposes.
4. All remade clips must be in 16:9 aspect ratio (the video itself must be a rectangle, not a square).
5. Audio and titles of any kind are not required. These will be done later by the editing crew.
6. Please ensure that all remade clips are both well-lit and that the camera is steady.
7. Your hands should NOT be seen. Please use fishing line instead. Also insure that no other people or animals are in the background.
8. Though HD video is not required, please ensure that you film, edit and upload your remade clips in the highest possible quality.
What was the first community remake to not have Thomas as one of the characters? by SpongeEngine423

For those who don\'t know, since 2007 DieselD199 has been providing a range of videos to entertain the online community. He has, for the most part, focused on making parody videos of the popular children\'s television show, Thomas and Friends.

All of my work is based off of the Railway Series by the Reverend W. Awdry and Christopher Awdry, as well as the show adapted by Britt Allcroft and David Mitton! The stories, however, are of my own invention unless otherwise noted, with a lot of new and fun characters throughout

Remaking your favorite episodes with a different style. My style is towards a realistic set with most of the work going towards filming rather than editing. Just like the real Thomas The Tank Engine and Friends show seem to do in Season 1-7.
Bringing the Island of Sodor to life like never before! Currently we are broadcasting on new original Thomas and Friends series made with Tomy TrackMaster engines.
